abstract: Warren E. Buffett is a skilled deal maker, but who will negotiate such favorable deals for Berkshire Hathaway after he is gone?
snippet: Warren E. Buffett is a skilled deal maker, but who will negotiate such favorable deals for Berkshire Hathaway after he is gone?
lead_paragraph: Acquisitions usually come with a nice premium for the seller. But when Warren E. Buffett is the buyer, there is typically something of a discount.

headline.main: With His Magic Touch, Buffett May Be Irreplaceable for Berkshire
headline.print_headline: With His Magic Touch, Buffett May Be Irreplaceable for Berkshire
